title: RemoveSection
description: Model for validation of the remove configuration.

include.description: regular experssion according to it which files to clean

ncycles_delay.description: number of cycle_length periods with which the cleaning is shifted to the experiment start day to the past.

cleaning_delay.description: time period with which the cleaning is shifted to the experiment start day to the past. Should be a multiple of general.times.cycle_length.

cleaning_max_delay.description: time period which defines the cleaning according to the cleaning_delay to the past. Should be a multiple of general.times.cycle_length.

step.description: time step which determines moments when to make a cleaning, should be a multiple of general.times.cycle_length.

dry_run.description: test cleaning without to  delete files

wipe.description: Flag for cleaning everything in a path

remove_from_scheduler.description: Remove suite from the used scheduler.

remove_not_completed_suites.description: Force removal of suites not completed

path.description: path to the folder where files will be cleaned

include.description: regular expression for files to select for cleaning

exclude.description: regular expression for files to explicitly exclude from cleaning
